titleStmt.title: The Psalter of Dauid in Englyshe, purely and faythfully tra[n]slated after the texte of Felyne: euery Psalme hauynge his argument before, declarynge brefely thentente [and] substance of the hole Psalme
Bible. O.T. Psalms. English. Joye.
titleStmt.author: Joye, George, d. 1553.

notesStmt.note: Felyne = Martin Bucer. Translated by George Joye.
Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC.
At foot of colophon: "Cum priuilegio Regali" and "Praise ye the lorde. Amen,".
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
